description: This Java class 'ProductRequest' is a Data Transfer Object (DTO) used for receiving incoming payload data to create or update a product in the system. It includes validation annotations, Swagger schema annotations, and standard getters/setters.

classes.name: ProductRequest
classes.description: DTO representing the incoming payload for creating or updating a Product.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the product.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the name of the product.

methods.name: getPrice
methods.description: Returns the price of the product.

methods.name: setPrice
methods.description: Sets the price of the product.

methods.name: getQuantity
methods.description: Returns the available quantity of the product.

methods.name: setQuantity
methods.description: Sets the available quantity of the product.
